thread.title: Hyundai Super Bowl Commercial 2017: Soldiers Watch Game with Family in Touching Ad!
thread.title_full: Hyundai Super Bowl Commercial 2017: Soldiers Watch Game with Family in Touching Ad!

author: Just Jared
title: Hyundai Super Bowl Commercial 2017: Soldiers Watch Game with Family in Touching Ad!
text:
Hyundai ’s commercial that aired following the final play of the 2017 Super Bowl gave us all the feels and it was actually filmed during the actual game.
The commercial featured the stories of several soldiers and they got to experience the game in a room full of screens that made it feel like they were at NRG Stadium in Houston with their family members by their side.
Isn’t technology just so amazing?!
Watch the full commercial below and make sure to grab some tissues before you press play!

A Better Super Bowl | NFL Hyundai Super Bowl LI
